about.title: About Us
about.description: At EcoExport, we export high-quality materials such as scrap metal, wood, and dried fruits, committed to sustainability and trust in every delivery.
about.qualityDescription: We ensure that every product meets the highest quality standards.
about.sustainabilityDescription: We are committed to caring for the environment in all our operations.
about.trustDescription: Our priority is to build strong and reliable relationships with our customers.
